PackageInfo.Name: Default
PackageInfo.Desc: Plain and simple challenges. Nothing in this pack should have any long term consequences. If it were a movie, this would be rated PG.

PackageInfo.Name: Let's Get Physical
PackageInfo.Desc: A pack that revolves around physical actions that could hurt you. Expect things like doing pushups, pick up a player, to little more sadistic things like getting slapped or pinched.

PackageInfo.Name: Too Much Information
PackageInfo.Desc: Learn what you didn't need to know as facts are revealed that were better left unsaid

PackageInfo.Name: Marksman
PackageInfo.Desc: Things that require a marker, permanent for more fun

PackageInfo.Name: Act It Out
PackageInfo.Desc: Charades like things that require you to act or mime activities
